Instructions.text: Welcome to the fantastic world of flotation. Ready to start making some money with mining?

Great! Before doing that let's quickly go through the UI of the game. Can you see the button labeled 'Job' in the right top corner. Close this dialog box by pressing the 'X' button on the top, then open it again by clicking that button
Good job! Now click on the circle in the middle of the screen to go to the flotation cell window. Then check what are the components available.
options: Cell Parameters (Air, Froth), Flow Rate, Cu Grade, Cu Recovery

Instructions.text: Excellent. Check out the Cu grade's graph. What is the actual Cu Grade on that stream?
You are ready for the first challenge: What happens to the Concentrate Cu recovery if you change the air flow rate from 2 to 5 cm/s?
You are now officially introduced to the Flotation views. See you later!
